title: New Downtown Apartment!
posting_body: The Angelus on 4th Ave has fully renovated apartments available March 1st!
This beautiful historic Downtown building is one block from the water and within walking distance of all that downtown has to offer.
The building has been completely restored with modern amenities, on site laundry, all new flooring, appliances, cabinetry, paint, windows, high ceilings, secured entry and much more.
It has a very cool vintage vibe and some units even offer views of the city and water!
Currently available are 1 & 2 bedroom units and studios.
These units will lease up fast, so hurry, do not miss out on being a part of this unique community.
For more information and specific unit availability, please call
